properties.description: Free workshop sessions that we’d be happy to be listed to encourage people to come and be warm and comfortable in The Met. One is our fortnightly ‘Meet Me at The Met’ session for over 50s. There’s an art activity and teas and coffees and it’s free of charge.

properties.description: We have a fire and lots of cosy, warm & thick blankets as well as cushions, all in our sensory room. We use these in our sessions and supportive group chats.
